onboarding_flow.content: App logo, tagline 'Never lose a warranty claim again', single CTA
Track warranties, Get alerts before expiration, Access receipts instantly
Explain why permissions are needed with clear skip option
Empty state with encouraging message and prominent add button
onboarding_flow.goal: Drive first item creation for activation

core_usage_flow.content: Sections: Expiring Soon, Active, Expired with item cards
Camera capture, form fields, category picker, save button
Product info, countdown timer, receipt viewer, edit/delete actions
Notification settings, upgrade to premium, restore purchases, about
core_usage_flow.goal: Customize experience and convert to premium

primary_navigation.rationale: Simple 3-tab structure keeps focus on core actions. Dashboard is primary destination, Add is always accessible, Settings contains secondary features.

levels: Section level: Expiring, Active, Expired on Dashboard
Detail level: Full item view with documents
content_hierarchy.organization_principle: Status-based grouping prioritizes items needing attention (expiring) over stable items (active)

home_screen.layout: Vertical scroll with collapsible sections. Top: Search/filter (future). Section headers with counts. Item cards in each section. FAB for quick add.
home_screen.primary_cta: Floating Action Button (Add Item) - always visible
home_screen.accessibility_notes: Section headers are semantic headings. Item cards have full accessibility labels including days remaining. FAB has tooltip.

core_feature_screens.layout: Full-screen form with camera preview at top, scrollable form below
core_feature_screens.accessibility_notes: Form labels properly associated. Required fields clearly marked. Error messages announced to screen reader.

core_feature_screens.purpose: View complete warranty information and documentation
core_feature_screens.layout: Scrollable detail view with receipt image hero, countdown prominent, info cards below
core_feature_screens.accessibility_notes: Image has detailed alt text. Countdown announced as 'X days remaining'. Actions in logical tab order.

core_feature_screens.layout: Grouped list with sections: Account, Notifications, About
core_feature_screens.accessibility_notes: Toggles have clear on/off state announced. Links open in-app browser or external.

core_feature_screens.layout: Modal with benefits list, pricing cards, legal disclosures
core_feature_screens.accessibility_notes: Prices clearly announced. Selected plan indicated. Dismiss button prominent and labeled.

primary_actions.interaction: Tap FAB â†’ full-screen add form with camera
primary_actions.feedback: Haptic on FAB tap, success toast on save, item appears in dashboard

accessibility_alternatives: Voice control labels on all interactive elements

visual_design_direction.brand_personality: Trustworthy, organized, protective. Like a digital filing cabinet that works for you.

typography.primary_font: System font (SF Pro on iOS, Roboto on Android)
typography.readability_notes: Body text minimum 16pt, headings use semibold weight, line height 1.5 for body

screen_reader_support: All images have descriptive alt text
visual_accessibility: Color not sole indicator of status
